quote.author: Nag R1
quote.body: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.

quote.author: Napoleon Hill
quote.body: Life is what happens to you while you're making other plans.

quote.author: Harvey S. Firestone
quote.body: The secret of my success is a two word answer: Know people.

quote.author: Anonymous
quote.body: Be grateful for luck, but don't depend on it.

quote.author: Dale Carnegie
quote.body: If you want to conquer fear, don't sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
